name: Welcome to NPC Town!
description:
[Story]
The protagonist is transferred to an unfinished game world.
There's no combat, no demon lord...but there are cute girls.
"Welcome to NPC Town!"
The protagonist is intrigued by the girl greeting him, but she only repeats the same dialog.
In that case...does that mean the girls here can't refuse any sexual harassment?
The scumbag protagonist concocts his devious town violation plan...

[Gameplay]
A simple CG-collection style game about searching the town for cute girls to have sex with!
There are no troublesome battles or errands to get in the way of your H fun time!

Contains 18 fuckable heroines, such as elf, dancer, nun, warrioress, fairy,
maid, princess, queen, etc...

[Features]
3 stages per character - Clothed, underwear, nude
Generic eyes / pubic hair variations
Ero SFX / cross-section toggles
Text skip, text-window transparency
